assetProfile.address2: Intersection of Jahra St & Airport Road Shuwaikh, Safat PO Box 3311
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Noor Financial Investment Company  KPSC, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment and financial activities in Kuwait, the Middle East, Asia, and internationally. It operates through four segments: Investments, Real Estate, IT Services, and Hotel Operations. The company provides public placement and private placement advisory services; wealth management services; and transaction based advisory services including business valuations, portfolio valuation, purchase price allocation and goodwill impairment, as well as strategic financial advisory, including merger and acquisition transactions, restructurings, business modeling, change of control, going private, management buyout, and public private partnerships. It also provides investment advisory and portfolio solutions; and invests in local and international equities, public and private equity markets and real estate opportunities, as well as listed equities and financial products. In addition, the company operates Amman International Airport Hotel, a 4-stars hotel, as well as provides hospitality services and management of third-party hospitality businesses; owns, and manages residential and commercial properties, as well as provides maintenance for residential and commercial complex, entertainment centers, hotels, and tourist facilities; and develops, leases, and operates real estate properties. Further, it provides information technology solutions and services, including Oracle, Cloud ERP and Kiosk solutions, CMS/DMS and archiving, software development and integration, manpower outsourcing and recruitment, printers and copiers consumables, and maintenance and training services to a variety of institutions in sectors, such as governmental, oil & gas, banking & finance, education, and retail. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Kuwait City, Kuwait. Noor Financial Investment Company - KPSC operates as a subsidiary of National Industries Group Holding  KPSC.
